name: Loos: The Fallen Fourth
description:
There are thousands of stories to be told of the First World War. This is the story of the city of Dundee and how it was affected by a single battle hundreds of miles away. This is the story of the fathers, brothers and sons who volunteered for King and Country and the community they left behind. This is the story of the 4th Black Watch: Dundee's Own.

Loos: The Fallen Fourth was created as an interactive documentary as part of the Great War Dundee project. Please visit www.greatwardundee.com for more details on the overall project.
